skills.title: Skill set
skills.text: I have gained experience in building projects with a variety of frontend technologies and concepts. With a strong growth mindset, I’m always exploring new areas to enhance my skill set.

about-me.title: WHO`S MICHAEL?
about-me.text: Hi there! I'm Michael, a frontend developer passionate about creating intuitive and efficient digital experiences. With a natural problem-solving mindset and a keen eye for detail, I specialize in transforming complex concepts into visually appealing and functional web solutions.Let’s collaborate and build something remarkable together!

projects.headline: Projects
projects.text-all: Take a look at some of my projects and see my front-end skills in action. Each project highlights my approach to building responsive, user-friendly designs with efficient code.
projects.text-join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
projects.text-debuggert: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Michael to find coins and Sprays to fight against the Bugs.
projects.text-pokedex: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.
